Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 2nd overall pick, by Pittsburgh in 1970...
Injured on 6/9/1970 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...

Injured on 9/17/1971 with a Inflamed Groin Muscle, out for one week...

Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
